member.name: ID3D10EffectDepthStencilViewVariable.GetDepthStencil
member.param: The address of a pointer to a depth-stencil-view interface. See .
member.returns: Returns one of the following Direct3D 10 Return Codes.

member.name: ID3D10EffectDepthStencilViewVariable.GetDepthStencilArray
member.summary: Get an array of depth-stencil-view resources.
member.param: A pointer to an array of depth-stencil-view interfaces. See .
The zero-based array index to get the first interface.
The number of elements in the array.
member.returns: Returns one of the following Direct3D 10 Return Codes.

member.name: ID3D10EffectDepthStencilViewVariable.SetDepthStencil
member.param: A pointer to a depth-stencil-view interface. See .
member.returns: Returns one of the following Direct3D 10 Return Codes.

member.name: ID3D10EffectDepthStencilViewVariable.SetDepthStencilArray
member.summary: Set an array of depth-stencil-view resources.
member.param: A pointer to an array of depth-stencil-view interfaces. See .
The zero-based array index to set the first interface.
The number of elements in the array.
member.returns: Returns one of the following Direct3D 10 Return Codes.

member.name: ID3D10EffectDepthStencilViewVariable
member.summary: A depth-stencil-view-variable interface accesses a depth-stencil view.
